description: This file defines interfaces for managing subscription objects in a publish-subscribe system, including creation, deletion, retrieval, and callback management for event subscriptions.

methods.name: subscription_event
methods.description: Returns the event string associated with a subscription.

methods.name: subscription_function
methods.description: Returns the callback function associated with a subscription.

methods.name: subscription_context
methods.description: Returns the context pointer associated with a subscription.

methods.name: subscription_flags
methods.description: Returns the flags associated with a subscription.

methods.name: subscriptions_get
methods.description: Retrieves a subscription object for a given event from a set of subscriptions.

methods.name: subscriptions_del
methods.description: Deletes a subscription for a specified event from a set of subscriptions.

methods.name: subscriptions_add
methods.description: Adds a new subscription for an event with specified callback, flags, and context.

methods.name: subscriptions_destroy
methods.description: Destroys and cleans up a subscriptions object.

methods.name: subscriptions_create
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new subscriptions object.

ctags.name: subscription_function_t
ctags.typeref: typename:void (*)(const char * event,const char * payload,void * context)
